title: Is This A Test Run? (Ep 1724)
description:
Are they preparing to use the same tactics on us that they’re using on Putin? In this episode, I address the latest evidence that the dangers to freedoms are growing at home. 

News Picks:

The Pfizer CEO appears to doubt his own vaccine.


This NY Times piece is illustrative about the deteriorating relationship between Russia and China.


Barack Obama has tested positive for COVID.

Psaki STILL thinks Russia hacked the election?


Iran is attacking us and threatening Americans on US soil. Yet, the Biden administration still wants a deal?
